doc.after: Spanish cuisine consists of a great variety of dishes which stem from differences in geography culture and climate It is heavily influenced by seafood available from the waters that surround the country and reflects the country s deep Mediterranean roots Spain s extensive history with many cultural influences has led to a unique cuisine In particular three main divisions are easily identified
